Job Title: Head of PCO Portfolio Services

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Administrative, General Business

Description:
Job Reference #
293852BR

Job Type
Full Time

Your role
Are you a finance professional with private credit operations and fund accounting expertise? Are you seeking an impactful role within a growing private credit platform?

Your team
As the Head of Private Credit Operations, you will be working in the UBS Asset Management Operations, Accounting and Control team in New York. This role is responsible for oversight across all financial reporting and operations functions for UBS AM’s private credit strategy.

Your expertise
You have a minimum of 12 to 15 years of private credit operational and fund accounting expertise and managerial experience and will lead the integrated private credit operating platform and team supporting the Credit Investments Group within UBS Asset Management.

This Head of Private Credit Operations role is responsible for oversight across all financial reporting and operations functions for UBS AM’s private credit strategy. Key responsibilities include:

 Significant private equity fund experience in finance and operations, with a focus on private fund accounting, cash management and investor reporting Managerial experience including proven track record of leading a team of professionals and working collaboratively across a diverse set of internal and external stakeholders (e.g. external auditors, Finance, Tax, Operations, Legal, third part providers including Fund Administrators, etc.) Review and ownership of all financial reporting workstreams for various investment products including annual audit, regulatory reporting, investor reporting (e.g. PCAP statements, asset level IRRs), marketing materials and internal business planning Ownership of data management and information quality/integrity, timely delivery, and seamless coordination across the entire operational platform. Includes in-depth oversight & governance over financial reporting across the operational platform within an outsourced model spanning Back office / Fund Accounting, Middle Office and an outsourced Fund Administrator. Providing insightful analysis to support Client Portfolio Management and Investor Relations team (e.g. fund returns for external LPs, PMs, external and front-office stakeholders) Oversight of rigorous cash management process, accounting and related operations across various ABL facilities Creation and maintenance of risk management reporting including liquidity, FX and fund guidelines Coordination of various operational workstreams including tax treatment of investments, capital calls and portfolio funding requirements

About Us
UBS is the world’s largest and the only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions: Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors..

We have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries.

Join us
At UBS, we embrace flexible ways of working when the role permits. We offer different working arrangements like part-time, job-sharing and hybrid (office and home) working. Our purpose-led culture and global infrastructure help us connect, collaborate, and work together in agile ways to meet all our business needs.

From gaining new experiences in different roles to acquiring fresh knowledge and skills, we know that great work is never done alone. We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?

Disclaimer / Policy Statements
UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

Experience Level (if available): None
